original_title: What is a better life (exorcised in the middle)
overview: In the words of Christina Sharpe, a "visually and sonically rich" work inspired by Dionne Brand's "A Map to the Door of No Return: Notes to Belonging."  Commissioned by Hayward Gallery Touring and The Box, Plymouth, for British Art Show 9.
title: What is a better life (exorcised in the middle)
